00051 Vector3D::Vector3D( double dx, double dy, double dz )
00052 : x(dx), y(dy), z(dz)
00053 {
00054 }
00055 
00056 Vector3D::Vector3D( const Normal& norm )
00057 : x(norm.x), y(norm.y), z(norm.z)
00058 {
00059 }

00061 Vector3D::Vector3D( Point3D point )
00062 : x(point.x), y(point.y), z(point.z)
00063 {
00064 }

00066 Vector3D::~Vector3D( )
00067 {
00068 }

00070 Vector3D& Vector3D::operator=( const Vector3D& vector )
00071 {
00072     if( this != &vector )
00073     {
00074         x = vector.x;
00075         y = vector.y;
00076         z = vector.z;
00077     }
00078     return *this;
00079 }
00080 
00081 Vector3D& Vector3D::operator+=( const Vector3D& vector )
00082 {
00083     x += vector.x;
00084     y += vector.y;
00085     z += vector.z;
00086     return *this;
00087 }
00088 
00089 Vector3D& Vector3D::operator-=( const Vector3D& vector )
00090 {
00091     x -= vector.x;
00092     y -= vector.y;
00093     z -= vector.z;
00094     return *this;
00095 }
00096 
00097 Vector3D& Vector3D::operator*=( double scalar )
00098 {
00099     x *= scalar;
00100     y *= scalar;
00101     z *= scalar;
00102     return *this;
00103 }
00104 
00105 Vector3D& Vector3D::operator/=( double scalar )
00106 {
00107     double inv = 1.0/scalar;
00108     x *= inv;
00109     y *= inv;
00110     z *= inv;
00111     return *this;
00112 }
00113 
00114 void Vector3D::zero()
00115 {
00116     x = 0.0;
00117     y = 0.0;
00118     z = 0.0;
00119 }

00121 bool Vector3D::operator==( const Vector3D& vector ) const
00122 {
00123     if( this == &vector ) 
00124         return true;
00125     else 
00126     return( 
00127         ( fabs(x - vector.x) < DBL_EPSILON ) && 
00128         ( fabs(y - vector.y) < DBL_EPSILON ) && 
00129         ( fabs(z - vector.z) < DBL_EPSILON ) );
00130 }
00131   
00132 bool Vector3D::operator!=( const Vector3D& vector ) const
00133 {
00134         if( this == &vector ) return false;
00135     else return ( x != vector.x ) || ( y != vector.y ) || ( z != vector.z );
00136 }
00137 
00138 double Vector3D::operator[]( int i ) const
00139 {
00140     if( i == 0 ) return x;
00141     else return (i == 1) ? y : z;
00142 }
00143 
00144 double& Vector3D::operator[]( int i )
00145 {
00146     if( i == 0 ) return x;
00147     else return (i == 1) ? y : z;
00148 }
00149 
00150 double Vector3D::LengthSquared( ) const
00151 {
00152     return( x*x + y*y + z*z );
00153 }
00154 
00155 double Vector3D::Length( ) const
00156 {
00157     return std::sqrt( LengthSquared( ) );
00158 }

00160 Vector3D operator-( const Vector3D& vector )
00161 {
00162     return Vector3D( -vector.x, -vector.y, -vector.z );
00163 }

00165 Vector3D operator+( const Vector3D& lhs, const Vector3D& rhs )
00166 {
00167     return Vector3D( lhs.x + rhs.x, lhs.y + rhs.y, lhs.z + rhs.z );
00168 }
00169 
00170 Vector3D operator-( const Vector3D& lhs, const Vector3D& rhs )
00171 {
00172     return Vector3D( lhs.x - rhs.x, lhs.y - rhs.y, lhs.z - rhs.z );
00173 }

00175 Vector3D operator*( const Vector3D& vector, double scalar )
00176 {
00177     return Vector3D( vector.x*scalar, vector.y*scalar, vector.z*scalar );
00178 }
00179 
00180 Vector3D operator*( double scalar, const Vector3D& vector )
00181 {
00182     return Vector3D( vector.x*scalar, vector.y*scalar, vector.z*scalar );
00183 }
00184 
00185 Vector3D operator/( const Vector3D& vector, double scalar )
00186 {
00187     double inv = 1.0/scalar;
00188     return Vector3D( vector.x*inv, vector.y*inv, vector.z*inv );
00189 }

00191 std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream& os, const Vector3D& vector )
00192 {
00193     os << vector.x << ", " << vector.y << ", " << vector.z;
00194     return os;
00195 }

00197 double DotProduct( const Vector3D& vA, const Vector3D& vB )
00198 {
00199     return vA.x*vB.x + vA.y*vB.y + vA.z*vB.z;
00200 }
00201 
00202 double DotProduct( const Vector3D& vA, const Normal& nB )
00203 {
00204     return vA.x*nB.x + vA.y*nB.y + vA.z*nB.z;
00205 }
00206 
00207 double DotProduct( const Normal& nA, const Vector3D& vB )
00208 {
00209     return nA.x*vB.x + nA.y*vB.y + nA.z*vB.z;
00210 }
00211 
00212 double AbsDotProduct( const Vector3D& vA, const Vector3D& vB )
00213 {
00214     return fabs( DotProduct( vA, vB ) );
00215 }
00216 
00217 double AbsDotProduct( const Vector3D& vA, const Normal& nB )
00218 {
00219     return fabs( DotProduct( vA, nB ) );
00220 }
00221 
00222 double AbsDotProduct( const Normal& nA, const Vector3D& vB )
00223 {
00224     return fabs( DotProduct( nA, vB ) );
00225 }
00226 
00227 Vector3D CrossProduct( const Vector3D& vA, const Vector3D& vB )
00228 {
00229     return Vector3D( ( vA.y*vB.z ) - ( vA.z*vB.y ),
00230                      ( vA.z*vB.x ) - ( vA.x*vB.z ),
00231                      ( vA.x*vB.y ) - ( vA.y*vB.x ) );
00232 }
00233 
00234 Vector3D CrossProduct( const Vector3D& vA, const Normal& nB )
00235 {
00236     return Vector3D( ( vA.y*nB.z ) - ( vA.z*nB.y ),
00237                      ( vA.z*nB.x ) - ( vA.x*nB.z ),
00238                      ( vA.x*nB.y ) - ( vA.y*nB.x ) );
00239 }
00240 
00241 Vector3D CrossProduct( const Normal& nA, const Vector3D& vB )
00242 {
00243     return Vector3D( ( nA.y*vB.z ) - ( nA.z*vB.y ),
00244                      ( nA.z*vB.x ) - ( nA.x*vB.z ),
00245                      ( nA.x*vB.y ) - ( nA.y*vB.x ) );
00246 }
00247 
00248 Vector3D Normalize( const Vector3D& vA )
00249 {
00250     return vA / vA.Length();
00251 }
00252 
00253 bool SameHemisphere( const Vector3D& vA, const Vector3D& vB ) 
00254 {
00255         return ( vA.z * vB.z > 0.0 );
00256 }
